import React from 'react'; import { useState } from "react"; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; export function UploadOrder() { const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const loading = useSelector((state) => state.loading); const order = useSelector((state) => state.order); const handleFileChange = e => setFile(e.target.files[0]); const handleFileUpload = () => { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append( "myFile", file, file.name ); dispatch( orderAdded(formData) ); }; return (
